message.content:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: [Designated Department]
Subject: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Dear [Department Name/Contact Person],

I hope this message finds you well. As part of our commitment to providing exceptional customer service, we have identified several unresolved customer grievances that require your expertise and further investigation. Below are the details of the cases that need your attention:

1. **Customer Name:** [Customer Name]
   - **Issue:** [Brief description of the issue]
   - **Date of Initial Complaint:** [Date]
   - **Reference Number:** [Reference Number]
   - **Current Status:** [Current status of the complaint]

2. **Customer Name:** [Customer Name]
   - **Issue:** [Brief description of the issue]
   - **Date of Initial Complaint:** [Date]
   - **Reference Number:** [Reference Number]
   - **Current Status:** [Current status of the complaint]

3. **Customer Name:** [Customer Name]
   - **Issue:** [Brief description of the issue]
   - **Date of Initial Complaint:** [Date]
   - **Reference Number:** [Reference Number]
   - **Current Status:** [Current status of the complaint]

We kindly request that you review these cases and take the necessary steps to resolve them. Please keep us updated on the progress and any actions taken. If you require additional information or have any questions, do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters. We appreciate your cooperation and support in ensuring our customers receive the best possible service.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Senior Customer Service Representative
[Your Contact Information]
[Company Name]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
